name: THE WARIO APPARITION!
description:
EVERY COPY OF MARIO 64 IS PERSONALIZED!

It was the dreams of thousands for Wario to be in Super Mario for the Nintendo 64. Their dreams came true.. The strong and powerful and endless belief and dreams of Wario fans's desires had fueled his manifestation into Super Mario 64. HE became a reality in this game. In this game, HE is here with you. Every Mario 64 game was made special and it was made just for you. L is real.

EVERY COPY OF MARIO 64 IS PERSONALIZED! EVERY COPY OF MARIO 64 IS PERSONALIZED! EVERY COPY OF MARIO 64 IS PERSONALIZED! EVERY COPY OF MARIO 64 IS PERSONALIZED! EVERY COPY OF MARIO 64 IS PERSONALIZED! EVERY COPY OF MARIO 64 IS PERSONALIZED! EVERY COPY OF MARIO 64 IS PERSONALIZED!
